My telegram of 2nd March. Afghanistan. If and when Afghans accept your invitation to Lucknow it would seem necessary to publish communique explaining circumstances that have led to visit, and conditions under which it is taking place. Inter alia, it would have to be made plain that Lucknow conversations do not constitute second stage of negotiations contemplated in Article 4 of Peace Treaty. Please telegraph, for my considerations, draft of what you would propose to publish.4
